changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO authors (name, birthdate) VALUES ('James Joyce', DATE '1882-02-02'), ('Virginia Woolf', DATE '1882-01--25'), ('Franz Kafka', DATE '1883-07-03'), ('Marcel Proust', DATE '1871-07-10'), ('Ernest Hemingway', DATE '1899-07-21'), ('Theodore Dreiser', DATE '1871-08-27'), ('Jack London', DATE '1876-01-12'), ('Jean-Paul Sartre', DATE '1905-06-21'), ('Jack Kerouac', DATE '1922-03-12'), ('Ray Bradbury', DATE '1920-08-22');
